title: PartyYeah 6 Pack Deft Hair Bun Maker, 6 Color Magic Donut Hair Bun Maker Reusable Bun Twister Knotted Wire Headband for Girl Women Hairstyle Tool
features: ✅Soft & Durable Quality: these doughnut hair bun tools are made of quality fabric, which are soft and comfortable enough for you to use or touch, really durable, so you can use it for long time; It is also lightweight, and your head will not be burdened with it, very simple to use
✅Fashionable Hairstyle Maker: Wonderful tool for creating new hairstyle, donut hairstyle ballet bun, updo hairstyles, chignons. Keep you hair neat and perfect all the time with multi-colors clips.

✅How to Use it: Step1-Put your pony tail through the hole then twist once or twice downwards to secure your pony tail. Step2-Pull down to the end of your pony tail but no to loose it. Step3- Roll inward until you feels it's tight, roll the ends to make a bun and twist the ends to secure.

✅Easy Care and Carry: 6 colors of hair bun suit you, there are 5 leopard prints and one black. It can fix your hair well and won't let it slip off. And bun maker for hair is about 35.5 x 9.5 cm/ 14 x 3.74 inch, proper size for you to create different hairstyles

✅Suitable for Any Occasions: With this french hairstyle twister elastic band, you will have the flexibility to create different hair bun hairstyles for various occasions, like party, dating, wedding, exercising, dancing, etc., easy to use, making you look more elegant
